dict.acceptation: 意图，目的；意向；意义，意旨；[医]愈合；

sent.orig: According to declaration method, the declaration of intention includes expression and silent declaration of intention.
sent.trans: 意思表示依其表示方法分别有明示的意思表示与默示的意思表示。

sent.orig: Weight reduction intention: 42.1% of students had the weight reduction intention in the coming six weeks.
sent.trans: 研究对象之减重意图：未来六周内会考虑减重的研究对象占了42.1%。

sent.orig: "It may not an intention from the speaker, It'sounds like an intention to the listener"
While I no intention, but I no intention of hurting you and your reputation Heart!
sent.trans: 我虽然是无意的，但我的无意却伤害了你的名誉及你的心！

sent.orig: It is our earnest intention to promote technical cooperation between our two countries.
sent.trans: 促进我们两国之间的技术合作是我们最诚挚的愿望。
